rating_comment: firstly- Belal, ur customer care is top of the world and ur team- so helpful and faster and friendly. Loved the stay with my families. excellent location, friendly service, extras and extras. anything we needed, within a msg - we got that. big rooms, nice and comfy sofa - and AC in all rooms helps us in heatwave during our stay. if anyone looking for family vacation or coming from overseas - best place to choose. all the shops, hospitals, pharmacy, food markets are within 5-10mins range. good job.
